mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRYBOARD(num, subject, content, reg_date, userId,qnaPwd) VALUES (INQUIRYBOARD_seq.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, #{qnaPwd})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM INQUIRYBOARD q JOIN member1 m ON q.userId=m.userId
SELECT q.num, m.userName, q.userId, q.subject, TO_CHAR(q.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_date, q.content FROM INQUIRYBOARD q JOIN member1 m ON q.userId=m.userId
SELECT r.num, r.content, r.regDate, r.userId, replyNum FROM INQUIRYReply r JOIN INQUIRYBOARD q ON r.userId = q.userID
SELECT m.userName, q.userId, q.num, q.subject, q.content, q.reg_date FROM INQUIRYBOARD q JOIN member1 m ON q.userId = m.userId WHERE num = #{num}
SELECT m.userName, r.regDate, r.content FROM INQUIRYBOARD q JOIN INQUIRYREPLY r ON r.num = q.num JOIN member1 m ON m.userId = q.userId
mapper.update: UPDAET INQUIRYBOARD SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} WHERE num = #{num} AND userId = #{userId}
